<!--Q:begin id=chapter1 tags=chapter,background v=1-->

# Chapter 1: Background

This chapter provides background information for the project.

## History

The project started as a simple tool and evolved over time.

## Goals

- Unified output format
- Integration with existing tools
- Easy to extend
<!--Q:end id=chapter1-->

<!--Q:begin id=chapter2 tags=chapter,implementation v=1-->

# Chapter 2: Implementation

This chapter covers the implementation details.

## Architecture

The project uses a modular architecture with:

- Core module for data models
- Backend modules for integrations
- Flow modules for complex operations
<!--Q:end id=chapter2-->
